comments.body:
Oh my god what a supercell!
It's beautiful!!

I live in Sweden, luckily we don't have tornadoes here, but i'd sure love to see one someday if i visit the U.S.
Spectacular!
Thanks for sharing this masterpiece of art! 
Best, Mattias
